segments.text: I just walked in, and what a scene!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My eyes immediately went to the sink, which is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing over the edge, forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can that woman not notice it at all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's calmly drying a plate, completely oblivious to the rising tide around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in the puddle, and she's just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the children, and my heart skips a beat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, for goodness sake!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand out, ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry that the stool will inevitably crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And someone is definitely going to slip on all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how much is going on that one person is missing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The quiet garden outside is such a stark contrast to this impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
